meanings.definition: A comic strip or comic book.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading comix in the newspaper every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: My favorite comix feature a superhero saving the city from villains.
meanings.sent3: The comix characters always make me laugh with their silly adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she dove into the colorful world of comix.
meanings.sent5: The comix illustrations popped off the page, bringing the stories to life.

meanings.definition: The art or practice of creating comic strips or comic books.
meanings.sent1: Creating comix requires a lot of creativity and skill.
meanings.sent2: Many artists enjoy expressing themselves through the medium of comix.
meanings.sent3: She decided to pursue a career in comix after attending a drawing workshop.
meanings.sent4: The comix industry is filled with talented individuals pushing the boundaries of storytelling.
meanings.sent5: His passion for comix shone through in every panel he drew.
